description: The blue pimpernel is a truly amazing species of plant. It is extremely tiny, but its vivid blue blooms are breathtaking and colorful. It is very low-maintenance and can thrive in many climates. Additionally, it does its best when planted in pots, meaning it can grow just about anywhere, making it a great choice for both gardens or balconies. The blue pimpernel also has an impressive bloom time, lasting from May until October, providing a long time of beautiful flowers. To top it off, the blue pimpernel is incredibly resilient and can survive extreme cold and drought conditions. Its charm and beauty make it a truly amazing plant species.
